g.title: ISSM Overview
g.text: Focus: Align security strategies with organizational goals
Plan policies, strategies, and continuity measures

g.title: Planning
g.text: Defines future states of IS usage, resources, structure

g.title: Vision
g.text: Future goals (SMART: Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound)

g.title: Strategy
g.text: Approaches for goals (e.g., Plan, Position, Perspective)

g.title: Orion_Method
g.text: Soft Systems Methodology for strategic ISS

g.title: BCP
g.text: Details recovery steps and critical processes

g.title: Uptime_Tiers
g.text: Tier I-IV define uptime and redundancy
